product_name: Burley Travoy Lower Market Trailer Bag
long_description: The Burley Travoy Lower Market trailer bag buttons securely onto the frame of your Burley Travoy trailer and offers large-size storage capacity. Sides expand to accommodate those extra-large loads. Holds several grocery bags, gym gear or large backpack. Burley Lower Market trailer bag closes with a cinch cord and is easy to remove from the trailer.
short_description: The Burley Travoy Lower Market trailer bag buttons securely onto the frame of your Burley Travoy trailer and offers large-size storage capacity. Sides expand to accommodate those extra-large loads.
